nodes.text: Star Wars: Clone Wars (toy line) was a line of toys released by Hasbro from 2003 to 2005. It included figures based on the characters and storylines depicted in various Expanded Universe materials released following Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, as well as the Star Wars: Clone Wars animated "micro series". A subset of the line was based on the characters' depictions in that animated series.
This should not be confused with the toy line based on the later series, Star Wars: The Clone Wars (toy line).
